rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Viri sancti gloriosum
sanguinem sanguine fuderunt pro domino amaverunt Christum in vita sua
imitati sunt invitati sunt
imitati sunt eum in morte sua et ideo
coronas corona triumphales meruerunt

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

verses.vBody: Unus spiritus et una fides erat in eis

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
